text:
If you only envision ’70s vibes when you picture bohemian style, today we’re here to refresh the way you think of the throwback trend that’s relevant again. This season, the boho trend received a fresh update and now lends cooler, more country prairie-girl vibes than the early 2000s boho looks that celebs like Nicole Richie and Rachel Bilson made popular. As the trend guide in our Fall Issue pointed out, Prairie Me is one of the biggest trends to add to your wardrobe this season.

To ensure you’re set with the coolest new wave of boho items without making a splurge purchase, we’re sharing the items you can score for under $100. To add another layer of cool factor, each item is already trending on sites like Topshop, Zara, and more of our favorite affordable site. For everything from cute tops to wear with your favorite jeans to easy floral dresses you can throw on with black ankle boots, shop all the boho clothes you need to freshen up your style this fall.

Tops

Free People All Dolled Up Top This floral top is perfect for date night.

H&M Blouse With Buttons The square neckline is super flattering.

Topshop Embroidered Mesh Crop Ruffle Top $60 SHOP NOW Pair this with anything high-waisted, and you're set.

Free People Sienna Printed Top So into the pale pink palette here.

Pixie Market Ali Shirt $76 SHOP NOW This top is a great way to transition from summer to the new season.

Free People Julia Sweetheart Top Just add your favorite jeans.

Intimately Time to Shine Bodysuit The billowy sleeves make this top particularly cool.

Dresses

Zara Floral Print Dress $70 SHOP NOW Copying this entire outfit ASAP.

Who What Wear Floral Print Ruffle Placket Midi Dress $35 SHOP NOW Also available in more sizes.

The Fifth Label Campus Dress $88 SHOP NOW We suggest styling these with tall black boots.

Re:named Floral Slip Dress $77 SHOP NOW Another great option for date night.

Topshop Embroidered Plunge Midi Dot Dress $95 SHOP NOW Pair this maxi dress with simple gold jewelry.

Intimately Lauria Printed Mini Slip We love the idea of layering a thin black turtleneck under this slip dress.

Mango Midi Printed Dress $80 SHOP NOW Simple and so easy to wear.

Topshop Linen Floral Pinafore Dress $75 SHOP NOW Pair this floral number with chunky ankle boots for a street style inspired outfit.

Skirts

Zara Asymmetric Skirt $50 SHOP NOW We love the tie-waist detail here.

Mango Checked Linen Skirt $60 SHOP NOW This outfit is fall goals.

ASOS Mixed Ditsy Floral Wrap Midi Skirt $56 SHOP NOW The mixed florals here add such a fresh spin.

Free People Modern Femme Vegan Suede Mini Skirt Such a steal for $60.
title: Cool Girls Everywhere Are Buying These 20 Under-$100 Boho Items

meta_data.description: The new wave of boho items is under $100. Take a peek inside to shop affordable boho clothes to add to your fall wardrobe.
